overview: Andrew and Tony are two close friends in high school who have known each other almost their entire lives. However, Andrew finds that deep inside his heart he actually has a crush on Tony. He wants to come out to him before they graduate, but he is afraid this will ruin their friendship. At the same time there is a girl, Jada, who is driving a wedge between them, leaving little time for Andrew to make his decision.
title: After School
